subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: The time  between the N.F.L. scouting combine  and the draft is critical for teams hoping to screen prospective draft choices, and for players hoping to sell themselves to potential employers.
snippet: The time  between the N.F.L. scouting combine  and the draft is critical for teams hoping to screen prospective draft choices, and for players hoping to sell themselves to potential employers.
